Answer: Shreyas is a songwriter who joined Ensiferum, the Finnish folk metal band, in the year 2022. Prior to this, the band was founded in 1995 by Markus Toivonen (guitar), Sauli Savolainen (bass), Kimmo Miettinen (drums) and Jari Mäenpää (singer and second guitar-player). They have released nine studio albums and Shreyas joined them as their peak songwriter.
